description:
Today is class 4-1`s physical exam, but someone doesn`t seem very excited? What strange tests await Pascal`s students? Meanwhile, our adventurers learn about being an adult and taking responsibility, and Hayato and Pascal investigate some footage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! 100% Shintai Kensa / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Terror! 100% Physical Exam / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
恐怖! 100%身体検査 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
